xxl.core.indexStructures

Class ORTree.Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.indexStructures.Tree.Node
      • xxl.core.indexStructures.ORTree.Node
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BTree.Node, MTree.Node, RTree.Node
    Enclosing class:
    ORTree

    public abstract class ORTree.Node
extends Tree.Node
    Node is the class used to represent leaf- and non-leaf nodes of ORTree. Nodes are stored in containers.
    See Also:
    Tree.determineContainer, Tree.getContainer, Tree.Node

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ORTree.Node.SplitInfo
      SplitInfo contains information about a split.

                                        Stack path,

        chooseSubtree in class Tree.Node
        Parameters:
        descriptor - the descriptor of the data object to insert
        path - the path from the root to this node
        isValidEntry - Function (IndexEntry→Boolean) that determines whether an indexEntry may be chosen

        the index entry refering to the root of the chosen subtree

      • chooseSubtree

        protected Tree.IndexEntry chooseSubtree(Object object,
                                        Iterator entries)
        Chooses the subtree which is followed during an insertion.
        Parameters:
        object - the object to be inserted. Its descriptor is used to choose the subtree
        entries - an iterator of the IndexEntrys which may be chosen
        Returns:
        the index entry refering to the root of the chosen subtree

      • grow

        protected void grow(Object data,
                    Stack path)
        Inserts data into the current node. If level>0 data must be an index entry.
        Specified by:
        grow in class Tree.Node
        Parameters:
        data - the entry to be inserted into the node
        path - the path from the root to the current node

      • post

        protected void post(Tree.Node.SplitInfo splitInfo,
                    Tree.IndexEntry newIndexEntry)
        Updates the current node with the split information, e.g. inserts the new index entry of the new node
        Specified by:
        post in class Tree.Node
        Parameters:
        splitInfo - the information created by split
        newIndexEntry - the new index entry refering to the new node created during the split

      • split

        protected abstract Tree.Node.SplitInfo split(Stack path)
        Splits the current node. A new node is created, but no handle is reserved for this node in its container (i.e. container.insert() or container.reserve() are not called at this stage). This means that no index entry for this node is passed to its parent-node.
        Specified by:
        split in class Tree.Node
        Parameters:
        path - the nodes already visited during this insert
        Returns:
        a SplitInfo containig all information needed about the split
